title: Casual Game Music Bundle 1
description: A bundle of 2 casual music packs, with positive and relaxing background loops for kids-friendly casual games!
longDescription:
#1 Casual Game Acoustic Guitar Pack (27 audio files)

Preview available here: Cyberwave Orchestra SoundCloud - CGAG


This music pack was created with casual games in mind! The choice of bright, acoustic instruments, was made to deliver that positive and relaxing feel for your next game project. We could definitely imagine it being used during the gameplay, or in the main menu of a puzzle, farming simulation, arcade, drawing, or any kind of casual and easy-going game! Of course, this pack is suitable for a wide variety of different uses, not necessarily tied to game development projects.



#2 Small Size Casual Game Music Loops Pack (38 audio files)

Preview available here: Cyberwave Orchestra SoundCloud - SSCGL


This loop pack was created with fun and flexibility in mind!

  • The choice of instruments and their combinations were made to instantly deliver that casual and upbeat feel, which translates great on any small speaker system.
  • Small in size to make them easier to integrate.
  • Multiple intensity variations.
  • Combine 120 BPM versions of 'Low Intensity and 'Percussion' layers to create new loop ideas!
  • 100 BPM versions are included for projects that require a slower tempo.
  • Bonus material included (3 action loops, 2 orchestral casual loops)
  • 38 audio files in total, for an affordable price.


We could definitely imagine these packs being used during the gameplay or in the main menu of a puzzle, arcade, RPG, or any kind of kids-friendly game! Of course, they are suitable for a wide variety of different uses, and not necessarily tied to game development projects.
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Wavs: 65

Number of Audio Cues: 65

Sample rate / bit rate: (i.e. 22,050 or 44,100 Hz)

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 29:40 min

Supported Development Platforms: All
